mapper.select: SELECT lo.loginCode AS loginCode ,lo.mainBusinessCode AS mainBusinessCode ,lo.memberId AS memberId ,lo.loginDate AS loginDate ,lo.loginFailCount AS loginFailCount ,lo.loginLatestTryDate AS loginLatestTryDate ,lo.loginAccessState AS loginAccessState ,lo.loginLogoutDate AS loginLogoutDate ,lo.loginIpAddress AS loginIpAddress ,lo.loginMacAddress AS loginMacAddress FROM k3_tb_login AS lo;
